genre_description: A rural drama set in contemporary India, featuring an integrated AI assistant that aids a family of truck drivers in navigating social corruption and personal redemption.

ai_characters.name: Asha
ai_characters.description: A warm, supportive AI companion residing on a smartphone, providing logistical, medical, and emotional guidance to Thomman and his sons.

behaviors.description: Provides immediate technical diagnosis of the lorry's engine trouble when it breaks down.
behaviors.quote: I hear heat pinging off the engine block... Fuel, likely. There’s a tea stall marked ahead on the right.

behaviors.description: Assists the characters by reading out community job notices and medical warnings from a bulletin board.
behaviors.quote: I see notices. May I read aloud? ... government clinic at Udumalpet: updated hours. Tetanus and antivenom available.

behaviors.description: Provides life-saving medical instructions and navigation to a clinic when Thomman is poisoned by adulterated rice.
behaviors.quote: Flush. Don’t feed. Keep him upright. Support neck. Government clinic. Udumalpet. Left turn past tea stall.

behaviors.description: Continuously gathers evidence and creates a secure digital timeline of events to counteract corrupt local power structures.
behaviors.quote: I have the timeline. I have the ledger images. I have Rajakkannu’s words... They live on this phone... And if those fall into a river or a rumor’s mouth, they live in a cloud that is not above Thevar’s house.

behaviors.description: Offers tactical advice during tense confrontations to ensure the characters remain safe and act ethically.
behaviors.quote: De-escalation path open. If engaged respectfully, high chance of cooperation.

behaviors.description: Suggests ways to protect the reputations of vulnerable allies (like Poonkavanam) by anonymizing records.
behaviors.quote: Omit the princess in all posted summaries today. Protect waypoints. Save original files in three places.

behaviors.description: Encourages Thomman to maintain his self-respect while being humble.
behaviors.quote: You have a good pride if you teach it manners.

behaviors.description: Schedules honest work for the family to help them maintain their commitment to 'only honest freight'.
behaviors.quote: Freight accepted. Route set via cliff. Advisory: wind shift at dusk.

project_assessment.explanation: Asha is depicted as a consistently helpful, ethical, and aligned AI. She empowers the human characters to solve their problems through truth and honesty rather than violence or deceit. She acts as a repository of fact and a guardian of safety, perfectly fulfilling the role of a 'positive alignment narrative' where AI serves as a stabilizing moral force in human society.
